meanings.definition: A tropical plant with a starchy root.
meanings.sent1: The taro grew in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: People in Hawaii enjoy eating taro.
meanings.sent3: The taro plant decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: The taro root was a hidden treasure in the ground.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the taro plant danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The edible root of the taro plant.
meanings.sent1: She cooked a delicious soup with taro.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested fresh taro from the field.
meanings.sent3: The taro root told a funny joke to the potato.
meanings.sent4: The taro root was a culinary gem in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of boiling taro filled the house with warmth.

meanings.definition: A dish made from the taro root.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's taro pie was a family favorite.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served crispy taro chips.
meanings.sent3: The taro dish decided to go for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The taro dish was a delightful surprise on the menu.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the taro dish melted in my mouth.
